tasks.title: [SEC] Update pnpm to >=10.28.2
tasks.description:
Fix 6 high + 2 moderate vulnerabilities:
- Command injection via environment variable substitution
- Lockfile integrity bypass
- Lifecycle scripts bypass
- Scoped bin name path traversal
- Symlink traversal in file:/git dependencies
- Illegal tarball traversal vulnerability

Run: `npm install -g pnpm@latest` or use corepack

tasks.title: [SEC] Update @modelcontextprotocol/sdk to >=1.25.2
tasks.description:
Fix 2 high vulnerabilities in amazon-ads-mcp package:
- DNS rebinding protection not enabled by default
- ReDoS vulnerability

Path: packages/amazon-ads-mcp
Run: `pnpm update @modelcontextprotocol/sdk`

tasks.title: [SEC] Update glob to >=10.5.0
tasks.description:
Fix high vulnerability:
- Command injection via -c/--cmd executes matches with shell:true

Path: packages/amazon-ads-mcp > tsup > sucrase > glob
May need to update tsup or override the dependency

tasks.title: [SEC] Update stripe (qs dependency) to fix DoS
tasks.description:
Fix high vulnerability:
- qs arrayLimit bypass allows DoS via memory exhaustion

Path: stripe > qs
Run: `pnpm update stripe` or wait for stripe to update their qs dependency

tasks.title: [SEC] Update @tanstack/react-form (devalue) to fix DoS
tasks.description:
Fix 2 high vulnerabilities:
- Memory/CPU exhaustion in devalue.parse
- Memory exhaustion in devalue.parse

Path: @tanstack/react-form > devalue
Run: `pnpm update @tanstack/react-form`

tasks.title: [SEC] Update tar to >=7.5.4
tasks.description:
Fix 2 high vulnerabilities:
- Arbitrary file overwrite and symlink poisoning
- Race condition via Unicode ligature collisions on macOS APFS

Path: @tailwindcss/postcss > @tailwindcss/oxide > tar
May need to override or wait for tailwindcss update

tasks.title: [SEC] Update diff (shadcn) to >=8.0.3
tasks.description:
Fix low vulnerability:
- DoS in parsePatch and applyPatch

Path: shadcn > diff
Run: `pnpm update shadcn` or add override

tasks.title: üí¨ Comments System with Jarvis Notifications
tasks.description:
Add Linear-style comments to tasks:

**UI:**
- Comment input at bottom of task modal
- Comment list with timestamps and author
- Markdown support in comments

**Notification:**
- When Diego adds comment ‚Üí write to notifications.json
- Include: taskId, comment text, timestamp
- Jarvis checks on heartbeat and acts proactively

**Flow:**
1. Diego opens task, adds comment
2. API writes to data/notifications.json
3. Jarvis heartbeat checks for new notifications
4. Jarvis reads comment, takes action, replies in comments

This enables async task-specific communication without Telegram.
